body:
You just need to set the selectExisting property of the QML FileDialog to false.

Example:

FileDialog {
    id: saveAsFileDialog
    title: "Please choose location to save"
    folder: shortcuts.home
    selectExisting: false
    onAccepted: {
        console.log("You chose: " + saveAsFileDialog.fileUrls)
    }
    onRejected: {
        console.log("Canceled")
    }
    nameFilters: [ "All files(*)" ]
}
title: FileDialog in QTQuick (QML): Save file under given name
